channel.title: Bedtime Stories
channel.itunes:subtitle: Bedtime Stories for an unsettling time
channel.itunes:author: Edward Gomez
channel.description: Classic and current bedtime stories for all the family narrated by astronomer and science communicator Edward Gomez during the COVID-19 pandemic isolation. These are some of mine and my children's favourites.
channel.itunes:summary: Classic and current bedtime stories for all the family narrated by astronomer and science communicator Edward Gomez. I started reading these for my children and office mates, following self-isolation in March 2020 for COVID-19 pandemic. These are some of mine and my children's favourites.

item.title: The Detective Dog
item.itunes:subtitle: Nell the detective helps to find all the stolen books from a school classroom.
item.itunes:author: Julia Donaldson and Sara Ogilivie
item.itunes:summary: Nell the detective helps to find all the stolen books from a school classroom.
item.description: Nell the detective helps to find all the stolen books from a school classroom.

item.title: The Troll
item.itunes:subtitle: A new take on the classic Three Billy Goats Gruff, but with pirates instead of goats.
item.itunes:author: Julia Donaldson
item.itunes:summary: A new take on the classic Three Billy Goats Gruff, but with pirates instead of goats.
item.description: A new take on the classic Three Billy Goats Gruff, but with pirates instead of goats.

item.title: Albert Le Blanc
item.itunes:subtitle: The new arrival in Mr Jolly's toy shop is a sad looking bear. But is he really that sad?
item.itunes:author: Nick Butterworth
item.itunes:summary: The new arrival in Mr Jolly's toy shop is a sad looking bear. But is he really that sad?
item.description: The new arrival in Mr Jolly's toy shop is a sad looking bear. But is he really that sad?

item.title: A Quiet Night In
item.itunes:subtitle: You'd be tired too if you had 4 young children, especially if they were elephants.
item.itunes:author: Jill Murphy
item.itunes:summary: You'd be tired too if you had 4 young children, especially if they were elephants.
item.description: You'd be tired too if you had 4 young children, especially if they were elephants.

item.title: The Bear, The Piano, The Dog and The Fiddle
item.itunes:subtitle: The story of a dog who plays the fiddle and tours the world with a big band, which makes his best friend sad.
item.itunes:author: David Litchfield
item.itunes:summary: The story of a dog who plays the fiddle and tours the world with a big band, which makes his best friend sad.
item.description: The story of a dog who plays the fiddle and tours the world with a big band, which makes his best friend sad.

item.title: The Polar Express
item.itunes:subtitle: A magical train journey to the North Pole to meet Santa.
item.itunes:author: Chris Van Allsburg
item.itunes:summary: A magical train journey to the North Pole to meet Santa.
item.description: A magical train journey to the North Pole to meet Santa.

item.title: The Squirrels Who Squabbled
item.itunes:subtitle: Two squirrels want the same pine cone for their late harvest.
item.itunes:author: Rachel Bright & Jim Field
item.itunes:summary: Two squirrels want the same pine cone for their late harvest.
item.description: Two squirrels want the same pine cone for their late harvest.

item.title: The Sheriff of Rusty Nail
item.itunes:subtitle: How a sheriff and his pig, deal with a pirate outlaw.
item.itunes:author: Sophie Willis
item.itunes:summary: How a sheriff and his pig, deal with a pirate outlaw.
item.description: How a sheriff and his pig, deal with a pirate outlaw.

item.title: Paddington
item.itunes:subtitle: The classic story of polite but clumsy bear from Darkest Peru who makes friends with a family in a famous London station.
item.itunes:author: Michael Bond
item.itunes:summary: The classic story of polite but clumsy bear from Darkest Peru who makes friends with a family in a famous London station.
item.description: The classic story of polite but clumsy bear from Darkest Peru who makes friends with a family in a famous London station.

item.title: Room on the Broom
item.itunes:subtitle: And accident prone witch meets some new friends, and a rather unfriendly dragon.
item.itunes:author: Julia Donaldson & Axel Scheffler
item.itunes:summary: And accident prone witch meets some new friends, and a rather unfriendly dragon.
item.description: And accident prone witch meets some new friends, and a rather unfriendly dragon.

item.title: We're going on a bear hunt
item.itunes:subtitle: A classic story, but what happens if you actually find a bear...?

item.itunes:summary: A classic story, but what happens if you actually find a bear...?
item.description: A classic story, but what happens if you actually find a bear...?

item.title: A Squash and a Squeeze
item.itunes:subtitle: A little old lady isn't happy with her little house, until all her animals move in.

item.itunes:summary: A little old lady isn't happy with her little house, until all her animals move in.
item.description: A little old lady isn't happy with her little house, until all her animals move in.

item.description: A lonely Rock n Roll monster befriends a kindly knight

item.title: The Unexpected Banquet
item.itunes:subtitle: The Queen of Sundimundee invites a lot of important people to a banquet. She promptly forgets and is forced to improvise in hilarious ways.

item.title: The King with the Paper
item.itunes:subtitle: The king of Incrediblania is sick in bed but his court make a puppet to meet with visiting dignataries. A well-meaning fairy causes a bit of commotion by bringing the puppet to life.
item.itunes:author: Norman Hunter
